ci_support_linux_64_python3.10.____cpyth:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
hepmc2:
- '2.06'
libboost_devel:
- '1.88'
numpy:
- '2'
pin_run_as_build:
  python:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
python:
- 3.10.* *_cpython
root_base:
- 6.36.8
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.description:
A C++ software library, designed to provide fast and efficient reweighting
of large Monte Carlo datasets containing semileptonic b-Hadron decays to
any desired New Physics, or to any description of the hadronic matrix
elements. See the HAMMER website for more information.
about.summary: Helicity Amplitude Module for Matrix Element Reweighting

name: hammer

about.description:
A C++ software library, designed to provide fast and efficient reweighting
of large Monte Carlo datasets containing semileptonic b-Hadron decays to
any desired New Physics, or to any description of the hadronic matrix
elements. See the HAMMER website for more information.
about.summary: Helicity Amplitude Module for Matrix Element Reweighting

about.description:
A C++ software library, designed to provide fast and efficient reweighting
of large Monte Carlo datasets containing semileptonic b-Hadron decays to
any desired New Physics, or to any description of the hadronic matrix
elements. See the HAMMER website for more information.
about.summary: Helicity Amplitude Module for Matrix Element Reweighting

raw_meta_yaml:
schema_version: 1

context:
  name: hammer
  version: 1.4.1

package:
  name: ${{ name|lower }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://gitlab.com/mpapucci/Hammer/-/archive/v${{ version }}/Hammer-v${{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: b95e192727aa95ac736a269e84457adbdde3e85db15082da4129f4ed4c018c45
  patches:
    - 0001-Fix-support-for-newer-GCC.patch
    - 0002-Fix-cmake-compatibility.patch

build:
  number: 3
  skip: win

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib("c") }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - cmake
    - make
    - pkg-config
  host:
    - python
    - root_base
    - libboost-devel
    - hepmc2
    - yaml-cpp
    - numpy
    - matplotlib-base
    - cython
    - cymove
    - setuptools
  run:
    - python
    - matplotlib-base

tests:
  - python:
      imports:
        - hammer
      pip_check: false
  - script:
      - cd $CONDA_PREFIX/share/Hammer/examples
      - ./demo01
      - ./demo01card
      - ./demo01root
      - ./demo02
      - ./demo02root
      - ./demo03
      - ./demo03root
      - ./demo04
      - ./demo04root
      - ./demo04root2
      - ./demo05
      - ./demo07
      - ./demo08
      - ./demo09
      - ./demo10
      # Seems to be broken
      # - python demo03.py
      # - python demo04.py

about:
  license: GPL-3.0-only
  license_file: COPYING
  summary: Helicity Amplitude Module for Matrix Element Reweighting
  description: |
    A C++ software library, designed to provide fast and efficient reweighting
    of large Monte Carlo datasets containing semileptonic b-Hadron decays to
    any desired New Physics, or to any description of the hadronic matrix
    elements. See the HAMMER website for more information.
  homepage: https://hammer.physics.lbl.gov/
  repository: https://gitlab.com/mpapucci/Hammer
  documentation: https://hammer.physics.lbl.gov/HammerManual.pdf

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - chrisburr
